  • Method Details

    • addToWishlist

      @PostMapping("/add-to-wishlist") public void addToWishlist(@Validated Widget widget)
      User of Currently_Logged_In_User in database has Widget added to their list of wishlisted items
      Parameters:
      widget - Widget to wishlist
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no user is logged in
      IllegalArgumentException - if the wishlisted Widget is not found in the database

    • updatePaypalDetails

      @PostMapping("/update-paypal-details") public void updatePaypalDetails(@Validated Paypal paypal)
      Saves or updates the current Paypal form of the user Paypal is encoded using BCryptPasswordEncoder and then stored in the database
      Parameters:
      paypal - new Paypal to save
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - is thrown if the user is not logged in

    • updatePaymentDetails

      @PostMapping("/update-payment-details") public void updatePaymentDetails(@Validated PaymentDetails details)
      Saves or updates the current PaymentDetails of the user PaymentDetails is encoded using BCryptPasswordEncoder and then stored in the database
      Parameters:
      details - new PaymentDetails to save
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - is thrown if the user is not logged in

    • deletePaypal

      public void deletePaypal()
      Deletes the Paypal associated with the user

    • deletePaymentDetails

      public void deletePaymentDetails()
      Deletes the PaymentDetails associated with the user

    • deleteDirectDepositDetails

      public void deleteDirectDepositDetails()
      Deletes the DirectDepositDetails associated with the user

    • verifyPaypalDetails

      @GetMapping("/verify-paypal-details") public boolean verifyPaypalDetails(@Validated Paypal details)
      Returns true if the passed Paypal information matches the currently logged in User's Paypal Returns false if they do not match The comparison is done using the BCryptPasswordEncoder matches functionality
      Returns:
      boolean
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - is thrown if the user is not logged in
      IllegalStateException - is thrown if the user has no saved Paypal

    • verifyPaymentDetails

      @GetMapping("/verify-payment-details") public boolean verifyPaymentDetails(@Validated PaymentDetails details)
      Returns true if the passed details matches the currently logged in User's PaymentDetails Returns false if they do not match The comparison is done using the BCryptPasswordEncoder matches functionality
      Parameters:
      details - the raw PaymentDetails to compare with the stored PaymentDetails
      Returns:
      boolean
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - is thrown if the user is not logged in
      IllegalStateException - is thrown if the user has no saved PaymentDetails

    • updateDirectDepositDetails

      @PostMapping("/update-direct-deposit-details") public void updateDirectDepositDetails(@Validated DirectDepositDetails details)
      Saves or updates the current DirectDepositDetails of the user DirectDepositDetails is encoded using BCryptPasswordEncoder and then stored in the database
      Parameters:
      details - new DirectDepositDetails to save
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - is thrown if the user is not logged in

    • verifyDirectDepositDetails

      @GetMapping("/verify-direct-deposit-details") public boolean verifyDirectDepositDetails(@Validated DirectDepositDetails details)
      Returns true if the passed details matches the currently logged in User's DirectDepositDetails Returns false if they do not match The comparison is done using the BCryptPasswordEncoder matches functionality
      Parameters:
      details - the raw PaymentDetails to compare with the stored PaymentDetails
      Returns:
      boolean
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - is thrown if the user is not logged in
      IllegalStateException - is thrown if the user has no saved PaymentDetails
